links.title: Bulls & Bears Of The Week: Apple (NASDAQ:AAPL), Disney (NYSE:DIS), Ford (NYSE:F), Home Depot (NYSE:HD) And More
links.description: Benzinga has featured looks at many investor favorite stocks over the past week. Bullish calls included leaders in entertainment, tobacco and video games. Bearish calls included a Detroit automaker and big box retailer. Last week began with a mystery that could have geopolitical implications and the bankruptcy of an old-school retailer.
